content: Landed in NYC. Tokyo was a dream, but this city's energy is electric. Got my first AI-driven coding session lined up. Transitioning from sushi to smart contracts. Here we go!
Feeling a bit out of place at this tech meetup. Everyone's talking about NFTs, and I'm here just trying to understand blockchain basics. Gotta step up my game.
Walked away from the meetup feeling a bit lost but also motivated. Booked a spot at the blockchain conference next week. Time to dive deep and maybe find my footing in this tech world.
Catching up with family tonight. Planning to host a tech workshop for them. Should I introduce them to AI pair programming? Might be fun to watch their reactions.
Feeling more grounded after the family tech night. Now, I'm diving into smart contract audits with AI tools. It's like a puzzle, but with code. Might even contribute to an open-source project.
At the blockchain conference, I'm learning about AI's role in smart contract audits. Never thought I'd be this excited about code efficiency. Time to bring this back to my open-source project!
